Patient 40: Patient 40 is a 68-year-old female with a history of osteoporosis and atrial fibrillation. She is on alendronate for osteoporosis and apixaban for anticoagulation. Her medication list has been stable for the past year, following a switch from warfarin to apixaban due to labile INR levels. Her family history includes osteoporosis and cardiovascular disease. She has a known allergy to sulfa drugs.
